channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Extend Decline to Seven Weeks
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories fell for a seventh consecutive week, while product stocks saw large builds last week as refineries increased their capacity...

item.title: Winter Weather Lifts U.S. Natural Gas Futures
item.description: Natural gas futures were moving higher amid strong weather-driven demand across much of the U.S. while some production freeze-offs limit supply.

item.title: Lucid reports record quarterly vehicle deliveries, meets production target
item.description: Lucid Group on Monday reported record quarterly vehicle deliveries for the fourth quarter and confirmed production of more than 9,000 vehicles in 2024...

item.title: Tesla reports first-ever drop in annual deliveries
item.description: Tesla's fourth-quarter deliveries report follows a huge late-year rally in the stock that lifted its gain for 2024 to 63%.

item.title: Rivian stock has its best day ever after EV maker reports 2024 production, deliveries
item.description: Rivian on Friday said it produced 49,476 electric vehicles last year.

item.title: Nike CEO Elliott Hill outlines new strategy after retailer blames promotions for declining revenue and profit
item.description: Nike beat Wall Street's expectations on the top and bottom lines under new CEO Elliott Hill.

item.title: Here is our third-quarter earnings report card for 33 stocks in the portfolio
item.description: We ranked the quarterly reports of our holdings in the Club as great, good, not-so-bad and ugly.

item.title: Sterling's Fall Could Prove Limited in Absence of Sovereign Crisis
item.description: Sterling fell to an 8.5-month low versus the dollar. ING analysts said the currency is unlikely to fall much further, even after the 30-year U.K. gove...

item.title: ESG Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Tencent, Vestas Wind Systems and more in the latest Market Talks covering ESG Impact Investing.

item.title: Stocks Slip as Treasury Yields Creep Upward
item.description: Stocks edged lower after the 10-year U.S. Treasury yield advanced above 4.7% for the first time since last spring.
